action

id

HighRiskReferralChestXRT

title: Referral for high risk breast specialty evaluation

description: Consider referral to breast specialist to discuss primary risk reduction interventions. These may include medications to reduce risk (chemoprevention), risk reducing surgery or enhanced surveillance. Women at greater risk, such as those with a history of chest radiotherapy, may derive more benefit than harm from risk-reducing medications.

action.title: Referral for high risk breast specialty evaluation
action.description:
Consider referral to breast specialist to discuss primary risk reduction interventions.

These may include medications to reduce risk (chemoprevention), risk reducing surgery or enhanced surveillance. Women at greater risk, such as those with a history of chest radiotherapy, may derive more benefit than harm from risk-reducing medications.
